```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(rsconnect)

squirrel_census = 
  read_csv("data/clean_squirrel_2018.csv") |> 
  janitor::clean_names()

```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
fur_vec = squirrel_census |> pull(primary_fur_color) |> unique ()
  
selectInput (
  inputId = "fur_choice",
  label = "Select Fur Color",
  choices = fur_vec
  )
```



Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
renderPlotly({
  squirrel_fur_graph =
    squirrel_census |> 
    select(unique_squirrel_id, x, y, primary_fur_color) |>
    filter(!is.na(primary_fur_color))
          
  squirrel_fur_graph |> 
    filter(primary_fur_color == input[["fur_choice"]]) |> 
    plot_ly(x = ~x, y = ~y, type = "scatter", mode = "markers", color = ~primary_fur_color)
})


```
